channel.title: Restrictions, in need of help! :S [317 Delta]
channel.description:
Right, what i am trying to do, is add restrictions on wearing items.
I was thinking about getting silentCJ's owner, admin and mod capes, and putting restrctions on them... Eg, player rights needed for each of them...
This is because i want to add them to a "staffzone" shop, but not have mod's buying owner capes, and being able to wear them...
Eg, a mod tries to equip an admin cape, it should fail and say, "Only Administrators can wear this cape!"
I'm really not sure how i can do this :S Would really appreciate some help :)
